article_title: Cruz campaign swings through Terre Haute, finds a welcoming audience

article_metadata.news_keywords: , terre haute, ted cruz, republican party, antonin scalia, presidential candidate, primary election, john kasich, u.s. supreme court, governor, bernie sanders, internal revenue service, health insurance, woodrow wilson middle school, israel, barack obama, north carolina, u.s. military, donald trump
article_metadata.author: Nick Hedrick | Tribune-Star

og.description: Speaking to a packed crowd at Woodrow Wilson Middle School in Terre Haute Sunday afternoon, GOP presidential candidate Ted Cruz vowed to uphold the Constitution, protect religious freedom and rebuild
